content.description: Ascend the face, easier to the left (5.9) and harder to the right (5.10-).
content.location: Start in cave mouth.

content.description: Ascends the crack right of the huge hueco, climb through plates and over bulge.
content.protection: medium gear down low and bolts.
content.location: Belay from the picnic table.

climbs.name: Three Dogs Running
climbs.fa: Noah Monagle, Matt Monagle & Karl Kiser, Fall 2011

content.description: Technical moves at start, then moderate climbing to the anchor.
content.location: The face behind the tree to the right of BKM (aka PMS).

content.description: Several moves near the bottom provide the crux.  Continue up to easier climbing and a big ledge.  The three climbs on the slab are good beginner routes.
content.protection: TR, shares anchor with the climb to the left, Low G.
content.location: The route is the right side of the slab to the left of Moonstruck.  Rap the route.

content.description: Just another easier climb inside the campground proper.
content.protection: TR from the Slide Rule anchors.
content.location: This is the crack just left of Slide Rule.

content.description: Fun face climbing to a crux at the the third bolt.  Stay right of the bolt line at the top.
content.protection: Bolts to a chain anchor.  One can go around and sent up as a TR.
content.location: The route is on the campground short wall, facing north opposite the other short routes.  Rap the route.

climbs.name: Set Phasers To Stun
climbs.fa: Noah Monagle, Matt Monagle & Karl Kiser, Fall 2014

content.description: This overhanging route was found because it rained.  It might be dry when other routes are wet.  Keep moving and use the rests.  The holds are generally big.
content.location: The route is a little uphill of the campground bulletin board but left of the rising cliff.  Rap the route.

content.description: The hardest moves are in the first third of the climb.  Climb the crack and move right for a step or two at the end to get to the anchor.
content.protection: TR, shares an anchor with Drunken Master.
content.location: The route is the crack on the left side of a small face left of the picnic table.  Rap the route.

content.description: Ascend just left of arete through plates picturesque.
content.protection: gear for bottom crack then bolts.

content.description: Climb the face to the large ledge.  This climb provides access to the second tier climbs (Mooning the Moonies & Irreverend Moon).
content.location: Located in the alcove, north, and behind Drill Baby Drill.

content.description: There are two cruxes.  One is near the third bolt to the horizontal ledge and the second one is going above the horizontal ledge at the fourth bolt.  The white rock isn't great but the existing holds are fine for climbing.
content.location: The route is in the center of the campground a few feet uphill from Slide Rule.  Belay from a good ledge down low.  The leader would third class a few moves prior to the actual climbing.  Rap the route.

content.description: Climb the face to the anchor.
content.location: The left second tier route off the large ledge.  This is a good warm up for the harder route to the right.

content.description: The crux is around the first bolt.  Climb carefully or stick clip the first bolt.  Follow the diagonal upwards and left on fun face holds to the anchor.
content.location: Go to large slab left of Moonstruck.  Proceed up the gully on the left to a small crack with a bolt on the right side.  Rap the route.  The anchor is shared with the easy route to the right, Jr. Astronaut.

content.description: Climb left of huge hueco.  Climbing is easier to the left (5.9/5.10-) and harder directly over the last bolt (5.10c).
content.location: Belay from the picnic table.

content.description: The crux is the section  off the ground.  The climb shares an anchor with Spaced Monkey to the right.  The three climbs on this slab are good beginner routes.
content.protection: 6 bolts, climb up to the anchors at the top of the slab.
content.location: The climb is the middle route on the slab to the left of Moonstruck.  Start in a hand crack and continue upwards to the large ledge.  Rap the route.

content.description: Ascend left facing crack right of arete and climb through bulge.
content.location: Watch for resident lizards.

content.description: The hardest move is near the top.  This is a fun route for someone who hasn't climbed to any degree.
content.protection: Use a small trad rack with gear to three inches.
content.location: The climb is the crack on the slab left of Moonstruck.  Rap the route from the same anchor as Moon Walk.

content.description: Climb the face to the anchors.
content.location:
The right second tier route off the large ledge. 

  One can rap off the anchor to the ground (not the ledge) easily with a 60m rope.

climbs.name: Ground Control
climbs.fa: Sarah Brion and Lance Hadfield, Spring 2016

content.description: The climbing gets a bit harder as one gets higher on the route.  The crux is on the upper headwall.
content.protection: 7 bolts to chains.  {lace longer slings on bolts 4 and 5 to reduce rope drag.
content.location: The route is just downhill of Todaluna and uphill of the outhouse.  The route starts on the left side of a small cave.  Rap the route.

content.description: The crux is at the top of the climb although it is a little easier if one steps right.  This is another belay off the picnic table climb (well almost).  The better one uses their feet the less hard the pulls on the smaller face holds.
content.protection: Bolts to an anchor and chains.  It is easy to go around rocks to the left and set up as a TR.
content.location: The route is right of Public Convenience crack and left of the picnic table at the back of the campground.  Rap the route.  The route shares an anchor with the climb to the left. Public Convenience.

content.description: Climb straight up and then upward and right to the anchor.
content.location: Start behind the campground sign left of the rock shelter.

content.description: An original route retroed to be safe and environmentally friendly (red paint muted).  Good beginner route.
content.location: Located on ramp right of arete.

content.description: This area is the Luna Park campground proper (three picnic tables and firepits).
